text_handler

Class TextHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • text_handler.TextHandler

  • public class TextHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    TextHandler Class This class generates a JavaFX Text Node for a given set of attributes.

      • setFont

        public void setFont(java.lang.String textFont)
        Set Font

        Sets the font of the text. Input font is checked and validated. If an invalid font is entered, the default font will be selected.
        Parameters:
        textFont - String

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(javafx.scene.text.FontWeight fontWeight)
        Set Text Weight

        Sets the text weight of the text. Input is checked and validated. If an invalid text weight is entered, the default text weight will be selected.

        See javafx.scene.text.FontWeight for possible inputs
        Parameters:
        fontWeight - FontWeight
        See Also:
        FontWeight

      • setPosture

        public void setPosture(javafx.scene.text.FontPosture fontPosture)
        Set Text Posture

        Sets the text posture of the text. Input is checked and validated. If an invalid text posture is entered, the default text posture will be selected.



        Possible inputs

        FontPosture.REGULAR

        FontPosture.ITALIC
        Parameters:
        fontPosture - FontPosture
        See Also:
        FontPosture

      • setUnderlined

        public void setUnderlined(boolean isFontUnderlined)
        Set Text Underlined

        Sets if the text is underlined (true) or not (false).
        Parameters:
        isFontUnderlined - boolean

      • setColour

        public void setColour(java.lang.String hexColour)
        Set Text Colour

        Sets the colour of the text. Input is checked and validated. If an invalid colour is entered, the default colour will be selected.
        Parameters:
        hexColour - String. Must be 6 characters (standard hex notation)

      • setTextSize

        public void setTextSize(float textSize)
        Set Text Size

        Sets the size of the text. Input is checked and validated. If an invalid size is entered, the default size will be selected.
        Parameters:
        textSize - float. Can not be negative.

      • setXLocation

        public void setXLocation(int textXLocation)
        Set X Position

        Sets the X position of the text. Input is checked and validated. If an invalid X position is entered, the default X position will be selected.
        Parameters:
        textXLocation - Integer. Can not be negative.

      • setYLocation

        public void setYLocation(int textYLocation)
        Set Y Position

        Sets the Y position of the text. Input is checked and validated. If an invalid Y position is entered, the default Y position will be selected.
        Parameters:
        textYLocation - Integer. Can not be negative.

      • setWrappingWidth

        public void setWrappingWidth(int textWrappingWidth)
        Set Wrapping Width

        Sets the wrapping width of the text. Input is checked and validated. If an invalid wrapping width is entered, the default wrapping width will be selected.
        Parameters:
        textWrappingWidth - Integer. Can not be negative.
